page.title: 04EXAMS
page.content: AT OUR SCHOOL WE DO ALL OUR EXAMS IN THE SAME WEEK. WE DO THEM IN OUR DIFFERENT CLASSROOMS DEPENDING ON WHAT THE SUBJECT IS.IT IS ALWAYS BEST TO START REVISION SOME WEEKS BEFORE AND TO MAKE A ROTA IN WHICH YOU REVISE ABOUT TWO SUBJECTS AN EVENING.THIS IS HARD WORK, BUT IT IS ALL WORTH WHILE. WE HAVE EXAMS IN ALL OUR SUBJECTS, APART FROM P.E.(PHYSICAL EDUCATION). IN EXAMS THERE ARE STRICT RULES. YOU MUST ALWAYS BE QUIET AND DON'T TALK, ELSE YOU MAY BE DISQUALIFIED OR LOSE MARKS. YOU MUST NOT CHEAT IN EXAMS, WHEN WE HAVE AN EXAM THERE IS ALWAYS A TEACHER TO SUPERVISE. WHEN EXAMS ARE ON IT IS ALWAYS GOOD TO BE QUIET WHEN YOU GO AROUND THE SCHOOL,ESPECIALLY WHEN THE O AND A LEVEL EXAMS ARE ON. ALL THE EXAMS ARE DEVISED BY THE TEACHERS OR THE HEAD OF DEPARTMENT.
